cast.original_title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
cast.overview: A rogue band of resistance fighters unite for a mission to steal the Death Star plans and bring a new hope to the galaxy.
cast.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story

details.biography: Arthur L. Bernstein is a TV and film writer and producer, as well as A business developer.  Credits include Walt Before Mickey and Swing State (both purchased by Netflix, Amazon, ITunes and Comcast) and New Life, a story about cancer which is currently on Amazon Prime.  He just completed The Brawler, about former boxer Chuck Wepner, scheduled for release in 2019.  Bernstein is also life insurance and employee benefits analyst with Richard S. Bernstein and Associates, Inc. located in Palm Beach.
details.name: Arthur L. Bernstein
